name: Find 25 Magnetrons
description: Obtain 25 magnetrons in exchange for credit with the scrap merchant.

dialogue.offer: Since business is increasing around here, I've decided to start selling more specialized metal.  Problem is, I can't separate the metal out.  Fortunately, I found some old schematics on a machine for this sort of thing.  If you could get me 25 magnetrons, I can melt down the sorted stuff into bars.  I can quickly pay you in raw materials.
dialogue.advice: Magnetrons can be found in microwaves.  An apartment block should have tons of them.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  I'll start the smelting as soon as possible.
dialogue.success_lie: Where are they?  I don't believe you.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll do it myself.

name: Obtain 75 Charcoal
description: Obtain 75 lumps of charcoal in exchange for credit with the scrap merchant.

dialogue.offer: That machine I put together is working wonderfully, but the generator is nearly out of juice.  If you could get me 75 lumps of charcoal, I'll pay you however I can.
dialogue.advice: Its fairly simple to make some.  I don't know where you could find any, though.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  This should do for a while.
dialogue.success_lie: Where are they?  I don't believe you.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll do it myself.

name: Obtain 100 Solder Wire
description: Obtain 100 soldering wire in exchange for credit with the scrap merchant.

dialogue.offer: That machine I put together needs some repairs on it, but I'm out of soldering wire.  If you could get me about 100 spools, I'll pay you for it.
dialogue.advice: An electronics store might have some.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  This should do for a while.
dialogue.success_lie: Where are they?  I don't believe you.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll do it myself.

name: Establish A Trade Route
description: Establish trade relations between the scrapper and a refugee center, and bring back a writ of the agreement.

dialogue.offer: I was out scavenging recently, and I found one of those old evac shelters.  Turns out the computer was still on and had an address for a refugee center.  I figure they might want some spare metal, so I need you to go over there and strike a deal with them.
dialogue.advice: It should be pretty simple making the deal, but I'd recommend taking a car over there myself.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Please?  This is really important to me.
dialogue.inquire: What did they say about it?
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to trade with.

name: Establish A Trade Route
description: Establish trade relations between the scrapper and some artisans.

dialogue.offer: Business has been booming since you made a deal with that refugee center.  The last caravan that came by here mentioned something about a blacksmith down some old road.  Sounds like another business opportunity, so I need you to go over there and make a deal.
dialogue.advice: It should be pretty simple making the contract, but I'd recommend taking a car over there myself.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Please?  This is really important to me.
dialogue.inquire: What did they say about the agreement?
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to trade with.
